turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Yes. I would like to order a coffee drink from Starbucks espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, which starbucks did you want to order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, what do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a macchiato frappuccino with

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: no milk, extra substitute sugar and coconut almond.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry did you want a caramel macchiato or a frappucino? those are two different drinks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want a caramel frappuccino.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Frappuccino but I want with almond coconut milk and sugar substitute.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, you said you want a caramel frappuccino with almond and coconut milk and splenda starbucks on 20th and market.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want to place it now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have an account with them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order with your account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the order will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the receipt can be seen on your mobile device.
